Container.Name: Free Games Claimer
Container.Overview: Automatically claims free games on the Epic Games Store, Amazon Prime Gaming and GOG. [br] See documentation for more details: https://github.com/vogler/free-games-claimer/?tab=readme-ov-file#configuration--options
Container.Category: Downloaders: GameServers: MediaApp:Other Productivity: Tools: Status:Stable
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: VNC Epic Steam free automation gaming deals sales

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Container Port: 6080

Config.Name: Default login - Email
Config.Description: The email address to use for logging in

Config.Name: Default login - Password
Config.Description: The password to use for logging in

Config.Name: Epic Games Store - Email
Config.Description: The email address to use for logging in to the Epic Games Store. Overrides default email.

Config.Name: Epic Games Store - Password
Config.Description: The password to use for logging in to the Epic Games Store. Overrides default password.

Config.Name: Epic Games Store - 2FA OTP key
Config.Description: The OTP key to use for logging in to the Epic Games Store. See documentation for more details: https://github.com/vogler/free-games-claimer?tab=readme-ov-file#automatic-login-two-factor-authentication

Config.Name: Epic Games Store - Parental pin
Config.Description: The parental pin to use for logging in to the Epic Games Store.

Config.Name: Amazon Prime Gaming - Email
Config.Description: The email address to use for logging in to Amazon Prime Gaming. Overrides default email.

Config.Name: Amazon Prime Gaming - Password
Config.Description: The password to use for logging in to Amazon Prime Gaming. Overrides default password.

Config.Name: Amazon Prime Gaming - 2FA OTP key
Config.Description: The OTP key to use for logging in to Amazon Prime Gaming. See documentation for more details: https://github.com/vogler/free-games-claimer?tab=readme-ov-file#automatic-login-two-factor-authentication

Config.Name: Amazon Prime Gaming - Try to redeem external keys
Config.Description: Try to redeem keys on external stores (1 = true, 0 = false)

Config.Name: Amazon Prime Gaming - Try to claim DLCs
Config.Description: Try to claim DLCs (1 = true, 0 = false)

Config.Name: GOG - Email
Config.Description: The email address to use for logging in to GOG. Overrides default email.

Config.Name: GOG - Password
Config.Description: The password to use for logging in to GOG. Overrides default password.

Config.Name: GOG - Keep newsletter subscription
Config.Description: Keep the newsletter subscription (1 = true, 0 = false)

Config.Name: Legacy Games - Email
Config.Description: The email address to use for logging in to the Legacy Games. Overrides default email. Uses Prime Gaming email if not set.

Config.Name: Notification service
Config.Description: The Apprise notification service to use for notifications. See documentation for more details: https://github.com/vogler/free-games-claimer#notifications

Config.Name: Notification title
Config.Description: The title to use for notifications

Config.Name: Config data
Config.Description: Config data for application

Config.Name: Enable VNC browser
Config.Description: Enable browser. DO NOT CHANGE.

Config.Name: VNC window width
Config.Description: The width of the browser window

Config.Name: VNC window height
Config.Description: The height of the browser window

Config.Name: VNC password
Config.Description: The password for the VNC server

Config.Name: VNC data profile
Config.Description: Directory (inside Docker) for browser profile. DO NOT CHANGE.

Config.Name: Timeout
Config.Description: The amount of time in seconds to wait for the page to load

Config.Name: Login timeout
Config.Description: The amount of time in seconds to wait for the login page to load
